Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: When a node restarts, it should take into account wal data after the last snapshot
Issue.description: Say we have SnapshotIntervalSize = 100 MB, and node accumulated 80 MB of data before being killed. Then it restarts, it should take snapshot once accumulate 20 MB of data, instead of another 100 MB. Otherwise, we risk OOM if node is frequently rebooted.
